mapper.insert: insert into test2_table(test_id, test_code2, dict_name, sorted) values(${testId}, ${testCode2}, ${dictName}, ${sorted})
mapper.delete: delete from test2_table where test_code2 = #{test_code2} and test_id = #{test_id}
mapper.update: update test2_table set test_id = ${testId}, test_code2 = ${testCode2}, dict_name = ${dictName}, sorted = ${sorted}, where test_code2 = test_code2 = #{testCode2} and test_id = test_id = #{testId}
update test2_table set test_id = ${testId}, test_code2 = ${testCode2}, dict_name = ${dictName}, sorted = ${sorted}, where test_code2 = test_code2 = #{testCode2} t and test_id = test_id = #{testId}
